original_text: Someone who has worked hard all day will sleep well at night. That is true even if they have not had much food to eat. But the rich man worries about his riches. So he does not sleep well. Someone who has worked hard all day will sleep well at night.
korean_text: 노동자는 먹는 것이 많든지 적든지 잠을 달게 자거니와 부자는 그 부요함 때문에 자지 못하느니라

sentences.original_text: Someone who has worked hard all day
That is true even if they have not had much food to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 먹을 음식이 많지 않더라도 그것은 사실이다

sentences.original_text: But the rich man worries about his riches
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 부자는 자기 재산에 대해 걱정한다

sentences.original_text: So he does not sleep well
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 잠을 잘 자지 못한다

sentences.original_text: Someone who has worked hard all day
